105 CMR 410.000, 410.100 (\"minimum stan.proposition: The Massachusetts State Sanitary Code (105 CMR 410.000 et seq.), which implements M.G.L. c.111 and other public health statutes, establishes minimum standards for fitness for human habitation, including the provision of adequate hot water and sanitary facilities.

105 CMR 410.000 et seq..proposition: The Massachusetts State Sanitary Code (105 CMR 410.000 et seq.), which implements M.G.L. c.111 and other public health statutes, establishes minimum standards for fitness for human habitation, including the provision of adequate hot water and sanitary facilities.

M.G.L. c.111.proposition: The Massachusetts State Sanitary Code (105 CMR 410.000 et seq.), which implements M.G.L. c.111 and other public health statutes, establishes minimum standards for fitness for human habitation, including the provision of adequate hot water and sanitary facilities.

M.G.L. c.111, \u00a7127A.proposition: M.G.L. c.111, §127A and related provisions empower local boards of health to enforce sanitary code requirements and to address conditions that render premises unfit for human habitation; public-health and housing code violations regarding hot water reflect recognized obligations of landlords.

M.G.L. c.111, \u00a7\u00a7122, 127A.proposition: M.G.L. c.111, §127A and related provisions empower local boards of health to enforce sanitary code requirements and to address conditions that render premises unfit for human habitation; public-health and housing code violations regarding hot water reflect recognized obligations of landlords.

M.G.L. c.186.proposition: M.G.L. c.186 (Massachusetts landlord and tenant statutes generally; various sections discuss landlord/tenant rights and remedies).

M.G.L. c.93A.proposition: M.G.L. c.93A (Massachusetts Consumer Protection Act) — generally available for landlord misconduct though not asserted as an independent claim here; costs and fees sometimes relevant in landlord-tenant matters.

M.G.L. c.239.proposition: M.G.L. c.239 (summary process: contextual statutory framework for landlord-tenant disputes).
